title: A wet cavern
desc: A dark cavern, the only light an unattended fire in the middle of the room. Behind you, still, black water wraps around a bend, and a splintered row boat is on its edge. A single tunnel leads out of the room, its walls lit distantly by some more fire around a bend.
bDesc: A dark, wet cavern. Behind you is a splintered boat in black water. A fire is in the middle of the room.
exitDesc: There is a dimly lit cavern tunnel to the north, and dark, still water to the south.
